name: Tooth-N-Claw
languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
text: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

action.name: Freezing Breath (Recharge 5-6)
text: Tooth-N-Claw exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Source: Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath
